title: Regarding the Jinx, Pantheon and Nunu skin prices
body:
If the new skins aren't tied to harrowing then they better come out with a damn discount just like Brand, Vi and Kassadin skins did.
Rito Gaem, open vault

replies.body:
Hey MuchZedSuchFaker,

Slayer Jinx and Zombie Nunu will be on sale for 975 RP when they become available later this patch. In addition, Slayer Jinx, Slayer Pantheon and Zombie Nunu **are** legacy skins. Legacy skins will also be returning to the store later this patch.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9mEXBNif,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-02T20:49:50.259+0000)
>
> Hey MuchZedSuchFaker,
> 
> Slayer Jinx and Zombie Nunu will be on sale for 975 RP when they become available later this patch. In addition, Slayer Jinx, Slayer Pantheon and Zombie Nunu **are** legacy skins. Legacy skins will also be returning to the store later this patch.

Thanks for the answer. You're the example of a Rioter that knows how and when to communicate
why are they out so late?
Because Worlds, and Riot mismanaged their time.

> [{quoted}](name=Very Toxic Jinx,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9mEXBNif,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-02T17:49:39.576+0000)
>
> why are they out so late?

As Riot stated, these skins have nothing to do with the event and therefore aren't Legacy and are just normal skins that you'd get after a patch (because the new skins usually become available after some time) . Yes, that means you'll be able to buy them anytime just like a White Mage Veigar

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9mEXBNif,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-02T20:49:50.259+0000)
>
> Hey MuchZedSuchFaker,
> 
> Slayer Jinx and Zombie Nunu will be on sale for 975 RP when they become available later this patch. In addition, Slayer Jinx, Slayer Pantheon and Zombie Nunu **are** legacy skins. Legacy skins will also be returning to the store later this patch.



https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gvdf5n-zI14
